title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 180.1 - Loan of material
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 180.1 - Loan of material

State Regulations

Scientific specimens and collections may be loaned to
scientific institutions, museums, libraries or other responsible organizations
or to qualified scientists engaged in research, upon terms and conditions to be
set forth in an agreement between the department acting through the Assistant

Commissioner for State Museum and Science Service and the organization or
individual requesting the loan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
180.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
